modShortDescription: This adds the display of Day, Time on the menu screens (inventory, vehicle, quests, etc)
modDescription:
This adds the display of Day, Time on the [menu](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-menu/) screens (inventory, vehicle, quests, etc)

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/RELXIX-7DTD/A20_XML_Modlets/tree/main/RELXIX_UI_MenuTime)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25785-relxix-a20-xml-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Red Eagle LXIX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/red-eagle-lxix/)
